claims.claim: AI collaboration enables scientific innovation and R&D at previously unattainable scale
claims.quote: Collaboration leverages expertise in artificial intelligence from Genentech and NVIDIA to unlock scientific innovation and empower R&D at a scale previously unattainable in pursuit of novel therapies.

claims.claim: AI platform will dramatically accelerate drug discovery and development pace
claims.quote: Our collaboration to create Genentech's next-generation AI platform will dramatically accelerate the pace of drug discovery and development.

claims.claim: AI generates insights at unprecedented scale and speed
claims.quote: By harnessing the power of AI models and algorithms, with our unique data and experiments, we're unlocking scientific discoveries with incredible speed and generating insights at an unprecedented scale

claims.claim: AI makes drug development more predictable and cost-effective while boosting R&D success rates
claims.quote: Genentech believes that AI plays an invaluable role in revolutionizing drug development, in combination with people, science and technology, helping make it more predictable and cost-effective, boosting the success rate of R&D over the long term

claims.claim: AI has potential to revolutionize drug discovery by enhancing data analysis and prediction for faster treatments
claims.quote: Leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) have the potential to revolutionize drug discovery by enhancing data analysis and prediction, leading to faster and more effective treatments.

claims.claim: Lab in a loop approach streamlines traditional trial-and-error and improves model performance across all programs
claims.quote: This streamlines the traditional trial-and-error approach for novel therapies and improves the performance of the models across all programmes.

claims.claim: AI enables rapid generation and testing of thousands of virtual molecular structures
claims.quote: AI and ML also enable the rapid generation and testing of virtual structures for thousands of new molecules and the simulation of their interactions with therapeutic targets.

claims.claim: AI collaboration aims to bring medicines to patients faster than current methods
claims.quote: by doing so we have a tremendous opportunity to hopefully bring medicines to patients faster than we do today

claims.claim: AI will help design better therapies faster and extend lives of millions of patients
claims.quote: AI will help untangle disease biology, predict effective approaches, and design better therapies faster, ultimately extending and improving the lives of millions of patients.

claims.claim: Traditional drug development has become progressively slower, more expensive, and fraught with failure
claims.quote: the process of translating this knowledge into new medicines has become progressively slower, more expensive, and fraught with failure

claims.claim: Drug development costs exceed $2 billion per new drug, with some analyses at $2.8 billion
claims.quote: The fully capitalized, risk-adjusted cost to bring a single new drug to market now exceeds $2 billion, with some analyses placing the figure closer to $2.8 billion.

claims.claim: Only 7.9% likelihood of drug candidates successfully navigating from Phase I to market
claims.quote: The overall likelihood of a drug candidate successfully navigating the clinical trial process from Phase I to market is a mere 7.9%.
